template_info.name: Balanced Meta Core
template_info.description: A well-rounded competitive team that can adapt to any situation with both offensive and defensive options
template_info.usage_notes: This team can switch between offensive pressure and defensive play as needed. Emphasizes good core synergies and consistent performance.
learning_objectives: Mastering both offensive and defensive play

pokemon.name: starmie
pokemon.strategy: Fast special attacker with reliable recovery
pokemon.tips: Use as a pivot to gain momentum while threatening major damage

pokemon.name: zapdos
pokemon.strategy: Legendary electric wall with physical options
pokemon.tips: Excellent defensive typing resists many common attack types

pokemon.name: golem
pokemon.strategy: Sturdy physical tank with powerful retaliation
pokemon.tips: Counter surprises physical attackers; Explosion deals massive damage

pokemon.name: gengar
pokemon.strategy: Fast ghost with utility and damage potential
pokemon.tips: Destiny Bond provides insurance and can swing momentum dramatically

pokemon.name: machamp
pokemon.strategy: Physical powerhouse that breaks defensive cores
pokemon.tips: Dynamic Punch confusion can create opportunities for teammates

pokemon.name: dragonite
pokemon.strategy: Versatile attacker saved for late-game sweeps
pokemon.tips: Excellent stats across the board make it a reliable endgame threat
